mapper.select: SELECT * FROM item_metadata WHERE site=#{site} AND path=#{path}
mapper.update: UPDATE item_metadata SET path=path, name=#{name}, modified=#{modified}, modifier=#{modifier}, owner=#{owner}, creator=#{creator}, firstname=#{firstName}, lastname=#{lastName}, lockowner=#{lockOwner}, email=#{email}, renamed=#{renamed}, oldurl=#{oldUrl}, deleteurl=#{deleteUrl}, imagewidth=#{imageWidth}, imageheight=#{imageHeight}, approvedby=#{approvedBy}, submittedby=#{submittedBy}, submittedfordeletion=#{submittedForDeletion}, sendemail=#{sendEmail}, submissioncomment=#{submissionComment}, launchdate=#{launchDate}, commit_id=#{commitId}, submittedtoenvironment=#{submittedToEnvironment} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM item_metadata WHERE site=#{site} AND path=#{path}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM item_metadata WHERE site=#{site} AND path = BINARY #{path}
DELETE FROM item_metadata WHERE site=#{site} AND path like #{path}
mapper.select: SELECT im1.path FROM item_metadata im1 INNER JOIN item_metadata im2 ON im1.commit_id = im2.commit_id WHERE im2.site=#{siteId} AND im2.path=#{path} AND im1.path NOT LIKE '${blobFilePattern}'
